column5: I'd like to thank everyone for the Support & Kind words over the Last 5 months & I like to Pass on that I hope everyone that needs Strength, Positive Energy & Support gets it throughout their Battle with the Big C Merry Christmas & a Very Happy & Healthy New Year to all Spinnerbaitking
Thank you Richard. Look after yourself and have a very Merry Christmas and a healthy, happy New Year.
The same back to you Richard... Keep up the fight and always BBELIEVE

Jul 30th Mass was 18 X 8 cm, after 3 treatments it was 5.3 X ? cm & after 6 treatments it is 3.7 x 1.3 cm, Chemo Treatment was very Aggressive & the Doctor is very happy saying it was 99% successful, but I'm going to need Radiation Treatments, another Doctor should get a hold of me over the next couple of weeks & set up a few more test then likely Radiation 5 days a week for about 4 weeks, so off to the next step & we'll see what happens Merry Christmas Everybody & Happy New Year Tight Lines SBK
We'll be pulling for you. You and yours have a Merry Christmas and a happy, healthy new year.

I had no idea you what you were going through. Good luck and stay positive. You have a lot of people and prayers behind you. happy holidays to you and yours. I want to see more bass reports from you for many years to come !
I will put in a few words with my higher power.Be strong  Merry Christmas and a Healthy new year.

Dang Richard I had no idea I must have missed a thread before if you let us know or I had forgotten. I hope all the best for you in this battle we will be thinking of you for sure. Please keep us up to date. Mike
The best to you my friend .
Stay positive
Great news, please keep us updated as it shrinks into oblivion  All the best to you Richard and stay strong.
fantastic news! Hopefully makes Christmas a little merrier for you
I hope the news in the New Year will show even more promise.
Keep up the fight Richard... it seems to be going in the right direction!    If you get to thinking and need some motivational videos... just ask !
Thanks for the update Richard - only 1% to go man  Wishing you and your family all the best - my thoughts and wishes are with you.
Keep up the good fight Richard and all the best to you & your family in the New Year
Sounds like your going to beat this thing Rich.. Merry Christmas !!
I agree with Chris.......you got this down and now just need to finish it off....stay positive and you will be fishing come spring in fresh air and brilliant sunshine.  Bob
Thanks for taking the time to keep us updated it appears between your strength and our prayers it is working.   Art

glad to hear things are looking positive richard,keep your head up,and have a nice holiday....cause in the spring you have to come to my place on sturgeon lake and we will go get us a walleye dinner !!!! cheers bud
I KNOW WHAT YOUR GOING THROUGH, MY SISTER IS GOING THROUGH THE SAME THING..PRAYERS FOR EVERYONE GOING THROUGH THIS
Sounds like a very positive report Have a Merry Christmas, and an even better New Year!
Ditto,  Your 99% ahead which is simply awesome!
May Santa bring you a 'clean bill of health' this Christmas!
well put!  Keep on going - best of luck and a Merry Christmas to you and yours!  Cheers, Ryan
Great news Richard     Keep fighting and stay positive Best wishes for the holiday season Leechman
Way to go! Your almost there! 2012 will see it gone. Keep up the battle.
Keep up the fight Richard, I know 1st hand what you are going through as my wife is also fighting Cancer.. 1 year now,,,,
